::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Orchestra::

        Triggerhappy decides to stop =
fighting Astro Train and company so he flies off to find Astroblast and Men=
asor, and see how they are doing.

        "Skullgrin can handle them for a=
 while, but not for too long, so I gotta be quick," He said to himself.

  =
       Triggerhappy zoomed off at full speed past Astro Train and them, and=
 kept going until he was around the CF.  He flew over, and saw the battle. =
 He could see(and hear) Astroblast way out in the distance.  Triggerhappy f=
lew off towards there, until he could just see Astroblast, Menasor and Elem=
ent(and whoever else was there, such as Squawktalk).  

         "Astroblas=
t, you and Menasor get outta there, I'll hold off this pest!" He said throu=
gh his com to Astroblast.

           Triggerhappy flew closer(btw Jen D. T=
riggerhappy is a jet just so you know) and shot 2 photon cannon blasts at E=
lement.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         Skullgrin nodd=
ed.

         "Follow me," He said to Switchblade, walking into the base an=
d heading to the control room, slow enough so Switchblade could catch up.
~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Orchestra decided to be =
a risk taker and fired 2 plasma bolts at Unicron.
